sentences.en: Its analysis has addressed how it lost—by alienating too many blue-collar voters, for example—rather than why.
sentences.cn: 分析已经表明了它是怎么落选的了——例如，疏远了太多的蓝领选民——而不是为什么落选了。

sentences.en: I don't know, you're kind of alienating a large client there.
sentences.cn: 我不知道，您可是在孤立一个很大的客户群呀！

sentences.en: But the Clintons' tactics are alienating blacks and young people.
sentences.cn: 但是克林顿夫妇的策略正在排斥黑人和年轻人。
